bill.summary: 5/3/2002--Introduced. Authorizes use of certain funds appropriated to the Federal Emergency Management Agency to compensate the New York City Board of Education for operating and education-related expenses of New York City public schools, including mental health and trauma counseling and other appropriate support services, resulting from the terrorist attack on September 11, 2001.
